00014 #ifndef ULIB_APPLICATION_H
00015 #define ULIB_APPLICATION_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/options.h>
00018 
00019 #ifdef DEBUG
00020 #define U_MAIN_END(value) return value
00021 #else
00022 #define U_MAIN_END(value) ::exit(value)
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 #define U_MAIN(_class) \
00026 int U_EXPORT main(int argc, char* argv[], char* env[]) \
00027 { \
00028    U_ULIB_INIT(argv); \
00029    U_TRACE(5, "::main(%d,%p,%p)", argc, argv, env) \
00030    _class application; \
00031    application.run(argc, argv, env); \
00032    U_MAIN_END(UApplication::exit_value); \
00033 }
00034 
00035 /*
00036 #define U_MAIN(_class) \
00037 int WINAPI WinMain (HINSTANCE hinstance, HINSTANCE hPrevInstance, LPSTR command_line, int cmd_show) \
00038 { \
00039    U_ULIB_INIT(__argv); \
00040    int argc = 0; \
00041    char** _argv = __argv; \
00042    while (*_argv++) ++argc; \
00043    U_TRACE(5, "::main(%d,%p,%p)", argc, __argv, 0) \
00044    _class application; \
00045    application.run(argc, argv, 0); \
00046    U_MAIN_END(UApplication::exit_value); \
00047 }
00048 */
00049 
00050 class U_EXPORT UApplication {
00051 public:
00052 
00053         // Check for memory error
00054         U_MEMORY_TEST
00055 
00056         // Allocator e Deallocator
00057         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00058         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00059 
00060         static int exit_value;
00061         static uint32_t num_args;
00062 
00063         // COSTRUTTORI
00064 
00065         UString str; // NB: must be here to avoid DEAD OF SOURCE STRING WITH CHILD ALIVE...
00066         UOptions opt;
00067 
00068         UApplication() : opt(126)
00069                 {
00070                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UApplication, "", 0)
00071 
00072 #  ifdef U_OPTIONS
00073 #               ifndef U_OPTIONS_1
00074 #               define U_OPTIONS_1 ""
00075 #               endif
00076 #               ifndef U_OPTIONS_2
00077 #               define U_OPTIONS_2 ""
00078 #               endif
00079 #               ifndef U_OPTIONS_3
00080 #               define U_OPTIONS_3 ""
00081 #               endif
00082 
00083                 str = UString(U_CONSTANT_TO_PARAM(U_OPTIONS U_OPTIONS_1 U_OPTIONS_2 U_OPTIONS_3));
00084 
00085                 opt.load(str);
00086 #  endif
00087                 }
00088 
00089         ~UApplication();
00090 
00091         // SERVICES
00092 
00093         void run(int argc, char* argv[], char* env[])
00094                 {
00095                 U_TRACE(0+256, "UApplication::run(%d,%p,%p)", argc, argv, env)
00096 
00097                 U_DUMP_EXEC(argv, env);
00098 
00099                 // se esistono opzioni, queste vengono processate...
00100 
00101                 is_options = (argc > 1);
00102                 num_args          = opt.getopt(argc, argv, &optind);
00103                 }
00104 
00105         static bool isOptions()
00106                 {
00107                 U_TRACE(0, "UApplication::isOptions()")
00108 
00109                 U_RETURN(is_options);
00110                 }
00111 
00112 #ifdef DEBUG
00113         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00114 #endif
00115 
00116 protected:
00117         static bool is_options;
00118 
00119         void usage() { opt.printHelp(0); }
00120 
00121 private:
00122         UApplication(const UApplication&) : opt(0)      {}
00123         UApplication& operator=(const UApplication&)    { return *this; }
00124 };
00125 
00126 #endif
